```{python}
#| label: fig-gilbert-mixer
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "A Gilbert mixer based on bipolar differential pairs."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp
import schemdraw.logic as lgc

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    Q1 = elm.BjtNpn().drop('emitter')
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/4)
    elm.Line().right(d.unit).dot()
    pos1 = d.here
    elm.Line().right(d.unit)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4)
    Q2 = elm.BjtNpn().anchor('emitter').theta(0).reverse()
    d.here = pos1
    Ibias = elm.SourceI().down()
    elm.Ground()
    elm.Line().left(d.unit/4).dot(open=True).at(Q1.base).label(r'$v_\mathrm{rf,p}$', loc='left')
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/4).dot(open=True).at(Q2.base).label(r'$v_\mathrm{rf,n}$', loc='right')

    d.here = Q1.collector
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4)
    Q3 = elm.BjtNpn().anchor('emitter').theta(0).reverse()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().left(d.unit/2)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4)
    Q4 = elm.BjtNpn().anchor('emitter').theta(0)

    d.here = Q2.collector
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4)
    Q5 = elm.BjtNpn().anchor('emitter').theta(0).reverse()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().left(d.unit/2)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4)
    Q6 = elm.BjtNpn().anchor('emitter').theta(0)

    # load impedance
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4).dot().at(Q4.collector)
    d.push()
    elm.Line().right().tox(Q6.collector)
    elm.Line().down().to(Q6.collector)
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot(open=True).label(r'$v_\mathrm{out,p}$', loc='right')
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4)
    Z1 = elm.ResistorIEC().up()

    elm.Line().up(d.unit/2).dot().at(Q5.collector)
    d.push()
    elm.Line().left().tox(Q3.collector)
    elm.Line().down().to(Q3.collector)
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().left(d.unit/2).dot(open=True).label(r'$v_\mathrm{out,n}$', loc='left')
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4)
    Z2 = elm.ResistorIEC().up()

    # lo connections
    elm.Line().at(Q3.base).right().tox(Ibias.start).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().right().to(Q6.base)
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/4).dot(open=True).label(r'$v_\mathrm{lo,n}$', loc='left')

    elm.Line().at(Q4.base).left(d.unit/4).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().left(d.unit/2).dot(open=True).label(r'$v_\mathrm{lo,p}$', loc='left')
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().down(d.unit)
    elm.Line().right(d.unit*4.25)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit)
    elm.Line().left().to(Q5.base)

    # vdd
    elm.Line().at((Z1.end[0]-d.unit/4, Z1.end[1])).to((Z2.end[0]+d.unit/4, Z2.end[1])).label(r'$V_\mathrm{DD}$').linewidth(3)
```
